q1.question: What makes Biogance products different from other pet care brands?
q1.answer: Biogance is a pioneer in organic and natural pet care, using ECOCERT-certified ingredients, GMP production standards, and formulas free from parabens, phenoxyethanol, and animal oils.

q2.question: Are Biogance products tested on animals?
q2.answer: No. Our products are never tested on animals. We are truly committed to animal welfare, safety, and sustainability.

q3.question: Are these all products tested on animals?
q3.answer: Yes! Our organic range ship-supplies, such as lemon, tea tree, birds, roselle, and small mammals, each formulated for their specific needs.

q1.question: How can I track my order?
q1.answer: Once your order is confirmed, you'll receive a tracking link by email. You can also check your My Account → My Orders.

q2.question: How long does delivery take?
q2.answer: Delivery times vary by location, but most orders are processed within 24-48 hours and delivered in 3–5 working days.

q3.question: Can I cancel my order?
q3.answer: Yes, if your order hasn't shipped yet, you can cancel it directly from My Orders. If it has already been sent, kindly use either our return process; we'll return it back if you want a refund before it's even delivered.

q1.question: What if I receive a damaged or defective product?
q1.answer: If a product arrives faulty (e.g., broken pump, leakage), you can request a refund or exchange from the Support & Refunds tab in your account.

q2.question: How long does a refund take?
q2.answer: Refunds are usually processed within 7–10 business days after we receive the returned product.

q1.question: How does the Biogance Loyalty Program work?
q1.answer: For every €10 spent, you earn 1 point. Each point equals €1, which you can convert into discount vouchers. You also earn bonus points on your birthday, newsletter signup, or surveys.

q2.question: Can I transfer my loyalty points?
q2.answer: No, points are limited to the account and cannot be transferred or shared.

q1.question: Can I update my password anywhere?
q1.answer: Yes. In Settings → Update Password, you can change it anytime. For security, updating your password will log you out of all devices.

q2.question: How many pets can I add to my account?
q2.answer: You can add up to 5 pets. This helps us recommend tailored products.

q3.question: What happens if I delete my account?
q3.answer: When you request account deletion, we'll ask you for a reason (feedback helps us improve). After confirmation, your account and data will be permanently removed.

q1.question: How can I contact support?
q1.answer: You can submit tickets directly in My Account → Support & Refunds. You'll see all active and closed tickets with chat history.

q2.question: What issues can I raise a ticket for?
